title: Shuts off when im using more than one app. Software issues maybe?
content:
If I run YouTube and open up snap at the same time the phone randomly stops running freezes for about 3 seconds and shuts down.

I'm thinking software issues? A bug I'm on pie and I have the update for Android q but there's issues in that beta so I'm waiting for the bus to be fixed. So my issue is probably a software problem. I mean it's my first Google phone it's the pixel 2 and it's an amazing phone.
